summary: The story of a female German spy who willingly sacrifices her life for her country.
cast: Apollon Uni|Álex Nova|Kada-Abd-el-Kader|Hughie Mack|Alice Terry|Antonio Moreno|Mademoiselle Kithnou|Mickey Brantford|Rosita Ramírez|Frédéric Mariotti|Pâquerette|Fernand Mailly|Andrews Engelmann|John George
title: Mare Nostrum
